title: Software Developer / Consultant
details: Developing high-quality tested code in multiple projects using modern web technologies. Projects include a public sector client with high accessibility and usability standards, where I renewed the whole frontend UI with a designer for an outdated website.

title: Teaching Assistant
details: Assisting university students with programming exercises, and grading exercise and exam submissions. Worked in courses titled 'Programming 1' and 'Databases'.

title: Software Developer
details: Developing maintainable frontend and backend code for a website used in courses of the second largest university in Finland.

title: Junior Back-end Developer
details: Creating backend and databases from scratch for an IT staffing website as part of a small developer team.
